para.p: It is worth remarking that this is a factor of the Euler product for the Riemann zeta function.

We will use the following when working with the Fourier transform. 9 9 footnote 9 Dorian Goldfeld and Joseph Hundley, Automorphic Representations and
L

p

p
-adic Schwartz function. 12 12 footnote 12 Dorian Goldfeld and Joseph Hundley, Automorphic Representations and
L
-Functions for the General Linear Group, volume I, p. 17, Theorem 1.6.8.
